page.title: 14Recreation In Jedburgh
page.content: People in the town of Jedburgh have a wide range of hobbies like knitting and sewing,reading,card games,walking dogs,keeping pigeons and gardening. Children enjoy computers,chess, buiding lego models,fishing and board games.Many play basketball, football, tennis,badminton,squash,hockey, skiing (on a practice slope).There is a new swimming pool which was opened in 1974 Some of these activities listed take part at the newly opened sports centre Many people spend much time jogging and training for athletic events.Many women attend keep fit and slimming classes.Bingo also is played by many women.
